original_text: Then we left Sinai, as the Lord our God had commanded us to do. We travelled through the desert towards the hill country of the Amorites. You saw that the desert was very big and it made you very afraid. Finally, we arrived at Kadesh-Barnea.
korean_text: 우리 하나님 여호와께서 우리에게 명령하신 대로 우리가 호렙 산을 떠나 너희가 보았던 그 크고 두려운 광야를 지나 아모리 족속의 산지 길로 가데스 바네아에 이른 때에

sentences.original_text: as the Lord our God had commanded us to do
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님 여호와께서 우리에게 명하신 대로입니다

sentences.original_text: towards the hill country of the Amorites
You saw that the desert was very big
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 광야가 매우 넓다는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: and it made you very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 당신을 매우 두렵게 했습니다
